subject: My Greetings to you,
body:
My Greetings to you,
sent you this letter some time ago but I'm not sure if you got it, I am contacting you in respect of my late client Engr. Albert Robert, a national of Northern American,  who died of Automobile Accident in the year 2015 . He deposited a sum of US$,45,000.000 with a bank in my country before his death and he died without any registered next
of kin as he was long divorced and had no child .
Could you diligently come up for this claim, I will be glad to present you to the bank as his next of kin so that the proceeds of his fund will be done in your name. I am his personal lawyer and will give you all the necessary assistance
My names are Barrister James Adams. I to achieve this claim.But if you are not interested do not bother to respond back and Please treat this information as confidential.
If you are interested,  I need your urgent response for more details and also provide the following information,
1, Your Full Name:.......
2, Your House Address:..................
3, Your Country:..........................
4, Your Contact Telephone /Fax Number: ......
5, Your Age and Gender:.......................
6, Your Occupation: .................................
I guarantee that this will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law.
Awaiting Your immediate response,
Thanks,
Yours Faithfully,
Barrister James Adams
(
infojamesadams081@gmail.com
)

subject: Re:   My Greetings to you,
body:
Dear Barrister James Adams,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I received your letter and I am interested in learning more about the situation regarding your late client, Engr. Albert Robert.

I understand that he had no registered next of kin and you are looking for someone to come forward and claim his funds. Could you please provide me with more details about the process? How exactly would I be involved in claiming the funds? What documents or information would be required from me?

Additionally, could you clarify which bank holds the funds and what steps need to be taken to ensure a smooth transfer? It is important for me to have a clear understanding of the entire process before proceeding further.

I appreciate your assistance in providing these details. Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Cornelia

subject: Re: My Greetings to you,
body:
Dear Cornelia

Thanks for your response  to my proposal and your interest to work with me
.I am in receipt of your email. We shall be required to process and obtain
 the necessary legal and remittance documents from the probate to reflect
your name before the Bank will remit the Funds to your account. Please
attach a copy of my id card as a lawyer and a copy of the deposit
certificate with the Bank

The Funds are deposited with the United Bank For Africa, all  necessary
remittance documents will  be processed in your favour to reflect your name
as the legal beneficiary of the Funds.

Therefore to enable me to commence the processing of the necessary
documents, please kindly forward  the following information by writing them
out.

YOUR FULL NAME AND ADDRESS

DIRECT TELEPHONE NUMBER

A COPY OF YOUR IDENTIFICATION

A SAFE BANK ACCOUNT DETAILS WHERE THE FUNDS WILL DEPOSITED

I take this opportunity to assure you that the transaction will be
successfully completed as planned because of the concrete arrangement we
have put in place for the execution of the transfer.I assure you of utmost
Confidentiality. Therefore, all I ask of you is your full cooperation and
honesty in the handling  of the fund when it arrives in your account.Iwant to
let you no that this deal we cost us some money but no much and two of us we
take it care of it I await your response.



Thanks for your co operations.
Barrister James Adams
Telephone +2349137176441

subject: Re: My Greetings to you,
body:
Dear Barrister James Adams,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on this matter. Before I provide you with the requested information, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please explain in more detail what legal and remittance documents need to be obtained from the probate? How long does this process usually take?

2. Can you clarify how the Funds are currently deposited with the United Bank For Africa? Are they in a specific account or under a trust?

3. What are the next steps after I provide you with my full name, address, telephone number, and bank account details? How will the funds be transferred to my account?

I want to ensure that everything is clear before proceeding further. Your assistance in addressing these concerns would be greatly appreciated.

Best wishes,
Cornelia

subject: Re: My Greetings to you,
body:
Dear Barrister James Adams,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on this matter. However, before I proceed, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please provide more details about the nature of these funds? How did they come to be deposited with the United Bank For Africa?

2. What is the total amount of funds that will be remitted to my account?

3. Are there any fees or charges associated with processing and obtaining the necessary legal and remittance documents? If so, could you please provide a breakdown of these costs?

4. Can you explain what you mean by "the concrete we have put in place for the execution of the transfer"? What measures have been taken to ensure a smooth and successful transaction?

I apologize for my cautious approach, but it is important for me to fully understand the process and any potential risks involved. Once I have all the necessary information, I will be able to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Cornelia
